text: Antoni Pérez i Moya (1884–1964) was a Spanish choral conductor and composer of Catalan descent.Xose Avinoa Maestros, amigos, alcahuetes 1998 One of his best known pieces is Marinada. His son :es:Antoni Pérez Simó (1920–1996) continued his educational work and was also a composer. ==References== Category:1964 deaths Category:1884 births Category:Spanish composers Category:Spanish male composers Category:Spanish conductors (music) Category:Male conductors (music) Category:20th-century conductors (music) Category:20th-century male musicians
title: Antoni Pérez Moya
